title: LumaFusion for Android is coming to the Galaxy Store this year
content:
In October last year, developers behind the popular iOS video editor LumaFusion revealed that they were working on dedicated Android and Chrome OS versions of the app. At the time, the LumaTouch team said that it would share details about the Android and Chrome OS versions in the coming months, but no concrete timeline for

The post LumaFusion for Android is coming to the Galaxy Store this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has revealed that the Android version of the popular video editing app LumaFusion will land on the Galaxy Store this year.
